query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `system_test_runs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `run_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `run_type` enum('manual','scheduled','ci_cd','on_demand') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','running','completed','failed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `total_tests` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `passed_tests` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `failed_tests` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `skipped_tests` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `success_rate` int DEFAULT 0,
  `started_at` timestamp,
  `completed_at` timestamp,
  `duration` int,
  `environment` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'production',
  `branch` varchar(100),
  `commit` varchar(100),
  `triggered_by` int,
  `metadata` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `system_test_runs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `system_test_results` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `test_run_id` int NOT NULL,
  `test_suite_id` int NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('passed','failed','skipped','error') NOT NULL,
  `duration` int NOT NULL,
  `error_message` text,
  `stack_trace` text,
  `actual_output` json,
  `expected_output` json,
  `screenshots` json,
  `logs` text,
  `retry_attempt` int DEFAULT 0,
  `executed_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `system_test_results_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `system_health_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `component` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('healthy','degraded','down','unknown') NOT NULL,
  `response_time` int,
  `error_rate` int,
  `cpu_usage` int,
  `memory_usage` int,
  `disk_usage` int,
  `active_connections` int,
  `queue_size` int,
  `error_message` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `checked_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `system_health_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `performance_metrics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `metric_type` enum('api_response_time','database_query_time','llm_inference_time','file_upload_time','page_load_time','throughput','error_rate','cache_hit_rate') NOT NULL,
  `metric_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `value` int NOT NULL,
  `unit` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `endpoint` varchar(255),
  `operation` varchar(255),
  `user_id` int,
  `tags` json,
  `metadata` json,
  `recorded_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `performance_metrics_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `diagnostic_reports` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `report_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `report_type` enum('health_check','performance_analysis','security_audit','test_summary','comprehensive') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('generating','completed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'generating',
  `overall_health` enum('healthy','warning','critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'healthy',
  `summary` text NOT NULL,
  `findings` json,
  `recommendations` json,
  `metrics` json,
  `file_key` varchar(500),
  `file_url` varchar(1000),
  `generated_by` int,
  `generated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `diagnostic_reports_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `test_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `schedule_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `test_suite_ids` json NOT NULL,
  `schedule_type` enum('hourly','daily','weekly','monthly','cron') NOT NULL,
  `cron_expression` varchar(100),
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `last_run_at` timestamp,
  `next_run_at` timestamp,
  `notify_on_failure` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `notification_emails` json,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `test_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
command:

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,

  `status` enum('healthy','degraded','down','unknown') NOT NULL,
  `response_time` int,
  `error_rate` int,
  `cpu_usage` int,
  `memory_usage` int,
  `disk_usage` int,
  `active_connections` int,
  `queue_size` int,
  `error_message` text,
  `metadata` json,
  `checked_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `system_health_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `performance_metrics` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `metric_type` enum('api_response_time','database_query_time','llm_inference_time','file_upload_time','page_load_time','throughput','error_rate','cache_hit_rate') NOT NULL,
  `metric_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `value` int NOT NULL,
  `unit` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `endpoint` varchar(255),
  `operation` varchar(255),
  `user_id` int,
  `tags` json,

  `recorded_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `diagnostic_reports` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `report_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `report_type` enum('health_check','performance_analysis','security_audit','test_summary','comprehensive') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('generating','completed','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'generating',
  `overall_health` enum('healthy','warning','critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'healthy',
  `summary` text NOT NULL,
  `findings` json,
  `recommendations` json,
  `metrics` json,
  `file_key` varchar(500),
  `file_url` varchar(1000),
  `generated_by` int,
  `generated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `diagnostic_reports_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `test_schedules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `schedule_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `test_suite_ids` json NOT NULL,
  `schedule_type` enum('hourly','daily','weekly','monthly','cron') NOT NULL,
  `cron_expression` varchar(100),
  `is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `last_run_at` timestamp,
  `next_run_at` timestamp,
  `notify_on_failure` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `notification_emails` json,
  `created_by` int NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `test_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
